faqs.question: WHAT IS ADIDAS GLOBAL ACADEMY?
faqs.answer: adidas Global Academy is a globally accessible online learning platform created in partnership with Arizona State University for adidas employees. Using adidas Global Academy, learners can advance their individual and career goals by choosing from a library of curated courses.

faqs.question: WHO IS ADIDAS GLOBAL ACADEMY FOR?
faqs.answer: Currently, adidas Global Academy is available to adidas employees. Please sign in with your adidas credentials to access adidas Global Academy.

faqs.question: DO I HAVE TO PAY FOR THE COURSES THAT ARE OFFERED ON ADIDAS GLOBAL ACADEMY?
faqs.answer: All courses offered on adidas Global Academy are available at no cost to learners.

faqs.question: WHERE CAN I REQUEST TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE OR REPORT A WEBSITE PROBLEM?
faqs.answer: To request assistance or report a problem, email us at: support@adidasglobalacademy.com
